column6: The first story arc from the creative team of Andy Diggle (THUNDERBOLTS) and Roberto De La Torre (IRON MAN) reaches its shattering climax. Backed-up by the ruthlessly loyal ninja army known as The Hand, Daredevil declares war on a murderous cadre of dirty NYPD cops -- and Hell's Kitchen is the battleground!  But can Foggy Nelson and Dakota North find out who's really behind the recent spiral of violence before the city burns? Rated T  ...$2.99
column8: | inker:Roberto Delatorre | writer:Andy Diggle | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | colorist:Matt Hollingsworth | colorist:Esad Ribic
